article_title: A Novel Way to Skirt Taxes
article_text:
Will two North Carolina business owners succeed with a tax-avoidance technique—one that billionaire Sam Zell once tried—and wipe out current income taxes on their company's profits?

That question is currently being weighed in U.S. Tax Court, a specialized tribunal for disputes between the Internal Revenue Service and taxpayers. The court ruled in favor of the business owners on a key motion in December, and this year it could decide...
